engine.index.dao.crawler

Class BasicCrawlController

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.index.dao.crawler.BasicCrawlController

  • public class BasicCrawlController
extends java.lang.Object
    perform crawler4j configuration, url filtering for seed url
    Author:
    KIMSEONHO

      private static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> newIdxList
      각 url마다 할당될 idxNum (크롤러에 의해 +1씩 증가함) idxNum = indexing된 url의 갯수 + 1 부터 시작
      private static java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Integer,IndexDataBean> newIdxMap
      존재하지 않은 url에 대한 idx so crawler thread has processing, new idx must have concurrency for idx safety, atomicity during in creation data

      • newIdxList

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> newIdxList
        각 url마다 할당될 idxNum (크롤러에 의해 +1씩 증가함) idxNum = indexing된 url의 갯수 + 1 부터 시작

      • newIdxMap

        private static java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Integer,IndexDataBean> newIdxMap
        존재하지 않은 url에 대한 idx so crawler thread has processing, new idx must have concurrency for idx safety, atomicity during in creation data

        crawler initialize, start
        Parameters:
        list - bookmark data
        contributor - who is upload bookmark data?
        crawlStorageFolder - where is location for save file
        numberOfCrawlers - thread number for url crawling
